definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Imagine, for the sake of argument, that it is necessary to lock individual dice.
sentences.chinese: 为了讨论的方便，假设有必要锁定单个的骰子。

sentences.english: A higher roll led to more tickets.
sentences.chinese: 骰子掷出的点数越高，彩券得的就越多。

sentences.english: Learn how to dice up vegetables for curry chicken in this free recipe video.
sentences.chinese: 了解如何注册蔬菜骰子在这个自由的咖喱鸡食谱影片。

sentences.english: The optimal throw of the dice is to bandy them abroad.
sentences.chinese: 掷骰子最好的点数是丢开。

sentences.english: When the car has no more dice left, it's out of the game.
sentences.chinese: 当车已没有更多的骰子离开，它的退出比赛。

sentences.english: Take a set amount of money and hit the Blackjack and Craps tables in Las Vegas.
sentences.chinese: 带一笔钱去拉斯维加斯玩一下二十一点和双骰子。

sentences.english: So Baoyu was left to amuse himself with the other maids at dice or draughts.
sentences.chinese: 因此，宝玉只和众丫头们掷骰子赶围棋作戏。
掷骰子是个不错的例子。

sentences.english: An ancient game of India similar to backgammon that uses cowrie shells instead of dice.
sentences.chinese: 戏，类似于十五子棋，但用玛瑙贝代替骰子。

sentences.english: But instead of rolling whatever dice you normally roll you'll roll 12-sided dice!
sentences.chinese: 不过不同于普通的投骰，你将投12面骰子。

sentences.english: Then she lets her shoulders relax,picks up the dice.
sentences.chinese: 然后，她的肩膀松弛下来，拿起了骰子。

sentences.english: The gamesters will palm the dice and will cog.
sentences.chinese: 赌徒们藏骰子在手掌中并且要诈赌。

sentences.english: We ate seafood like shrimps and craps, and drank some abalone soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们吃了海鲜虾和掷骰子赌博，和喝了一些鲍鱼汤。

sentences.english: The sample program used for this article is a die-rolling program.
sentences.chinese: 本文使用的示例程序是一个投骰子程序。

sentences.english: After years of research on the dice issues, with unprecedented and unrepeatable breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 经多年的研究在骰子的问题上，有了空前绝后的突破。

sentences.english: Quite transparently, they’re rolling the dice in the world’s hottest casino.
sentences.chinese: 相当透明的是，他们正在世界上最火爆的赌场掷骰子。

definition: pai gow (gambling game played with dominoes)
